root.description: OverviewBentley's Hackpack is a minigame collection based on the Sly Cooper franchise for the Playstation 3 and Vita. It contains 4 minigames, each staring a character from the franchise - Sly, Bentley, Murray and Carmelita. As part of Sony's Cross Buy initiative, one purchase gives access to the game on both the PS3 and Vita.
